Then the RPG should never have had Unicron brought
into it. Unicron ultimately means Primus is involved
and it was well established in the original US comic
that Primus had the ability to teleport being (en
masse) I might add, over great distances. We see this
in Issue 73 when Primus Teleports EVERY transformer on
Earth at that time to Cybertron. So I can repost, but
essentially, it wont be realistic - I mean we're
talking about 2 deities here in this storyline. Any
action carries out by them that has any serious intent
will by its very nature be modding.
 --- airly2000 <airly2002@...> wrote: 
---------------------------------
Cycodronus,

I'm very sorry to said this but you should repost with
Shadimus and 
the bots that will fight with minions in Preds base,
'cause 
teletransportation isn't allowed.

Cya

Airly
